item.title: Ha next problem.. with Runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @Iron Iron
item.description:
@Iron wrote:

1 error
exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:server

my server file looks like:

public void killServer()
	{
		try
		{
			shutdownClientHandler = true;
			if (clientListener != null) clientListener.close();
			clientListener = null;
		}
		catch (java.lang.Exception __ex)100000		{
			__ex.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

	public static int EnergyRegian = 60;

	public static int MaxConnections = 35;
	public static String[] Connections = new String[MaxConnections];
	public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections];
	public static boolean ShutDown = false;
	public static int ShutDownCounter = 0;


}

I think i know what to change, but dont know what to change it to, so i figured id get a more “proffesional” help before i mass up my server :)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 07, 2006, 10:50:35 PM[/size][hr]cmon! no ones gonna help a lil ol’ noobsy like me :o
